name: Design Mirror
description:
Design Mirror is a plugin that sync your artworks with mobile app. You can preview your design on mobile phone in real time.

This plugin works with a desktop app and a mobile app which can download from http://www.psmirror.cn/en


Design Mirror是一款运行在Figma上的插件，可以让你通过手机实时预览你的设计稿，它需要和一个桌面客户端以及手机app一起工作，你可以在这里下载对应的客户端http://www.psmirror.cn/zh
